molecular.statistics.time_series.acorr¶

molecular.statistics.time_series.acorr(a, fft=False)[source]¶

Compute the lag-\(k\) autocorrelation \(\rho(k)\) from dataset \(a\).

\[\rho(k) = \frac{\gamma(k)}{\gamma(0)}\]

The function \(\gamma\) is from acov().

Parameters

  • a (numpy.ndarray) – One-dimensional array.

  • fft (bool) – Should fast Fourier transform be used?

Returns

Autocorrelation function

Return type

numpy.ndarray

Previous topic

molecular.statistics.time_series

Next topic

molecular.statistics.time_series.acov
